Deficiency	of	vitamin	D	can

Only a few foods contain 
vitamin D, including 
oily	fish	like	sardines,	
fortified	margarines,	some	
breakfast cereals and eggs. 
 
Breastfed babies from birth 
to one year of age, should 
be given a daily supplement 
of vitamin D throughout the 
year to make sure they get 
enough, as their bones are 
growing and developing very 
rapidly i
